Name: Golden Egg
About the game: A jump and run game: A young knight is looking for a golden egg in a magic world. But countless dangers are lurking. You have to avoid traps and find magic keys to solve the riddle of the golden egg. Open world: You can freely move around the levels and decide in which order you want to gather the magic keys. Try yourself! Can you solve the riddle of the golden dragon egg or will you fail? 4 playable levels, one level hub and a tutorial level The game autosaves whenever you reach the next flag! Some Traps are really tricky to escape Fast reflexes may help you. Can you beat the game in under 10 minutes? Mature Content Description The Game Is Recommended For All Ages.
